about_the_game:
The New MMORPG Fantasy Game Glory or Dominance - Game Info


Glory or Dominance is a massive online multiplayer roleplay game with a social and competitive nature, which is in advanced development, and I hope very soon you can dive into an amazing adventure with amazing graphics, sound, effects and huge possibilities, full of action, fantasy, puzzles, riddles, mysteries, victories, losses and strong emotions.
The game is based on the fantasy genre where magic, mystical creatures, secret societies and cults and what not are present. In the world of Glory or Dominance, you manage, develop and defend your territory, by means of your: Main character, Generals and small armies with which you fight for supremacy over the others.

Glory or Dominance is a Massively Multiplayer Online Fantasy game based on a rich story, open world, where you win and defend your place by creating friendships, guilds, alliances and following the path of diplomacy or war with others. Some of the main things in the world of Glory or Dominance are item creation, resource mining, territory exploration, trading, piracy, seafaring, hunting, fighting monsters or bandits, capturing castles, territory battles, boss battles, creating of clans and alliances, politics, quests and challenges and much more.
Here it all depends on you and your imagination!

The Kingdoms:


The action of the game takes place in the World of Kleiverog which consists of six kingdoms:

• Witera - Kingdom of Human

- The human race is one of the six ancient races, renowned for its generosity and pursuit of new discoveries and conquests. They are also the FOUNDERS of the “Great Trade Guild”, which hold the rights to trade and deliver goods and cargo in all regions. Also they have very strong Carpenters Guild, the Bounty Hunters Guild (which deals with the search for criminal elements in all territories), as well as the Builders Guild (whose services everyone uses to improve their defense facilities).

...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

• Xeivar – The Demon Kingdom

- The people of Xeivar are not very different in appearance from the human race, but they possess a spiritual energy that is fueled by Fire and when they are threatened or angry, their bodies and eyes are enveloped in flames (Fire Aura) which gives them a rather sinister appearance and because of this others call them Demons and take care not to mess with them. Because of their Aura of Fire, the people of Xeivar call themselves “the Children of Fire”. They have highly developed Alchemy and possess the largest library of Ancient Lore gathered over centuries stored in the “Sacred Temple - Atherzon” of the Fire Mages in Xeivar, where fire mages study old scrolls and ancient books as they develop their spells and train their skills.

...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

• Eidrall – Kingdom of the Elves

- Elves are a race whose people live entirely in harmony with nature, believing themselves to be the only intelligent creatures in the World of Kleiverog. The territory they inhabit is extremely rich in nature and inhabited by many rare mystical creatures, the Elves draw their vital energy from nature, are known for their skilled archers, as well as for their powerful Wizards “Druids” and their healing and strengthening spells. They have knowledge and experience in making healing and strengthening potions, as well as powerful bows made from a unique wood that only grows in very small areas in their territory, renowned masters in making jewelry and magical paints and elixirs. They hardly allow others to enter their domains without special approval from their rulers. They defend their lands and are territorially aggressive towards almost everyone!

...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

• Brukus - Land of the Orcs

- A race of fearless warriors possessing incredible strength. Large and strong, they are not interested in others and their political games and intrigues, they make compromises very hard and quickly solve “small disputes” and problems through their Strength. Brave warriors who bow to no one! They are known as much for their Strength as for their leather goods, which they process according to their secrets and ancient recipes to be as strong as iron and as light as silk, and for their amulets of protection and spells. They often hunt in Elven territories and hunt “sacred” animals for skin or bones, which is the main reason why the Elves hate them and call them “Barbarians”, but this does not bother them much, as a true Orc would say - the Stronger one, has the right, so what…?

...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

• Hodura - The Kingdom of the Dwarves

- Small in stature, but very hardy and cunning, they are the Masters of Steel and masters of the “Treasures of the Underworld”. Their territory is large, mostly mountains and hard to pass rocky areas, but it is the perfect place for them to mine and extract valuable resources, iron, silver and crystals. The blades and armor forged by their Masters are unmatched in strength. They aren’t particularly friendly unless they have a use for it. They prefer not to get involved in conflict and hoard their wealth for themselves, which is why their fame as misers is known throughout the World of Kleiverog. They hate the Orcs… Everyone knows their story how a glorious expedition to search for new deposits in Orc Territory and their attempt to take advantage of them by “cunning” ended badly and cost them great humiliation… they(the Orcs) beat them very hard and forbade them to show up in their territory. But that doesn’t make them any less powerful, especially when it comes to trading or enhancing weapons and metal armor by inscribing runes and magic patterns… there are no better than them at it!

...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

• Pireoris - Or the “cursed”

as others call them because of their ability and need to “feed” on soul energy. Pireoris are actually people from the land of Witera Kingdom, but during the “Great Battle of the Alliance” (until then Witera was one with Pireoris and ruled by two brother kings) a terrible tragedy happened. The final attack unleashes a powerful ‘contagion’ that mows many of the alliance’s warriors and they can no longer eat meat normally as it becomes poisonous to them, but they also gain the terrifying ability to ‘Drain’ life energy from any living thing. Which leads to the division of the territory, with all those affected along with their families being banished and founding the Kingdom of Pireoris. They hate Humans and consider themselves “Touched by the Power of the Etherium”, according to their beliefs, THEY are entitled to rule over Kleiverog. Since they cannot eat like everyone else they have found a way (via “Life Crystals”) to collect small amounts of life energy from animals and transfer it into fruits and vegetables so that they can get enough from their food. They, the Pireoris, state that they do not KILL living things to EAT them, and this makes them superior to the others they call “Carnivores”! The Kingdom of Pireoris is known for their dangerous witches, producing magic crystals, magic powder, and potions that are highly sought after and highly valued by everyone in Kleiverog. They often make raids into Hodura territory, where they obtain large quantities of crystal and instill hatred and fear in the Dwarves, who claim that they just like to harass them.

...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................

Combat Systems:


In Glory or Dominance there are several types of combat systems known as: Player vs Player, Co-Op Battles, PVE, clan wars, Fortress Battles, fortifications and instances, Pirate battles, as well as several types of arenas where, if you wish, you can prove yourself and win rewards, glory and popularity.
The game Glory or Dominance is an open world where PvP and PVE Battles throughout the territory are allowed, but are determined by some rules depending on the territories or instances that affect your reputation!
When you play, you interact with the entire eco-system of the game and the servers as, your actions can determine or create events, directly or indirectly influence the development of the world!

Trade:


The Glory or Dominance game world has various trading systems where you can (together or individually with friends) own shops with vendors, stalls, participate in public or private auctions, transport and guard cargo by land or sea, to sell or buy stolen goods and items (the latter is at your own risk, “All or Nothing” and may result in you being wanted and hunted by other players - “Bounty Hunters” or go to jail if you are not careful 😊, but if you are a skilled pirate or robber, you know that you can also take advantage of corruption to “save your skin” more easily ).
– Choices and Decisions are entirely yours, as well as their consequences! 😊
You just have to choose the Kingdom you want to defend, and which cause you will support!

content_descriptors.notes:
Please note that some of the clothing and outfits may be perceived as sexual content by certain circles or groups of people due to differences in their views.
The game contains fight scenes and physical interactions in which it is not directly emphasized, but also they can be perceived differently.
